io.spine.server.tenant

Class TenantRepository<T extends io.spine.base.EntityState,E extends TenantRepository.Entity<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.entity.Repository<I,E>
      • io.spine.server.entity.RecordBasedRepository<I,E,S>
        • io.spine.server.entity.DefaultRecordBasedRepository<io.spine.core.TenantId,E,T>
          • io.spine.server.tenant.TenantRepository<T,E>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of data associated with the tenant ID
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.spine.logging.Logging, Closeable, TenantIndex, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public abstract class TenantRepository<T extends io.spine.base.EntityState,E extends TenantRepository.Entity<T>>
extends DefaultRecordBasedRepository<io.spine.core.TenantId,E,T>
implements TenantIndex
    Abstract base for repositories storing information about tenants.

    • Method Detail

      • createStorage

        protected final RecordStorage<io.spine.core.TenantId> createStorage()
        Description copied from class: Repository
        Creates the storage for this repository.

        Default implementations use Repository.defaultStorageFactory() invoking its method which creates a storage compatible with the repository.

        Overwrite this method for creating a custom implementation of Storage.

        Overrides:
        createStorage in class RecordBasedRepository<io.spine.core.TenantId,E extends TenantRepository.Entity<T>,T extends io.spine.base.EntityState>
        Returns:
        the created storage instance

        Overrides:

        Parameters:

      • isTypeSupplier

        protected final boolean isTypeSupplier()
        Description copied from class: Repository
        Tells if this repository should be registered as a type supplier with a Stand of the BoundedContext to which this repository belongs.

        Normally repositories are type suppliers. Some types of internal repositories are not type suppliers because data of their entities should not be exposed. Those classes of repositories should overwrite this method returning false.

        Overrides:
        isTypeSupplier in class Repository<io.spine.core.TenantId,E extends TenantRepository.Entity<T>>
        Returns:
        true by default

      • keep

        public final void keep(io.spine.core.TenantId id)
        Stores the passed tenant ID in the index.

        If there is an entity with the passed ID, the method quits. Otherwise, a new entity with the default state will be created and stored.

        Specified by:
        keep in interface TenantIndex
        Parameters:
        id - the tenant ID to store

      • unCache

        protected final boolean unCache(io.spine.core.TenantId id)
        Removes the passed value from the in-memory cache of known tenant IDs.

        Implementations should call this method for removing the cached value for a tenant for which the record was removed from the repository.

        Parameters:
        id - the ID to remove from the cache
        Returns:
        true if the value was cached before and removed, false otherwise

      • clearCache

        protected final void clearCache()
        Clears the cache of known tenant IDs.

        Description copied from interface: TenantIndex
        Obtains the set of all stored tenant IDs.
